snippet: Sajmir Alimehmeti twice tried to enter Britain in attempts to join the Islamic State, and then tried to help another man who said he was looking to fight for the group, unaware that the man was an undercover federal agent, according to a federal complaint unsealed in Manhattan on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Sajmir Alimehmeti twice tried to enter Britain in attempts to join the Islamic State, and then tried to help another man who said he was looking to fight for the group, unaware that the man was an undercover federal agent, according to a federal complaint unsealed in Manhattan on Tuesday.

headline.main: New York Man Accused of Supporting ISIS
